articles.title: How to watch Chiefs-Colts Week 12: live stream, start time and more - Arrowhead Pride
articles.description: How to watch the Kansas City Chiefs’ Week 12 game against the Indianapolis Colts: TV schedule, start time, TV channel, live stream, odds and more.
articles.content: On Sunday afternoon, the (5-5) Kansas City Chiefs will welcome the (8-2) Indianapolis Colts to GEHA Field at Arrowhead Stadium for a Week 12 matchup. The battle between the leader of the AFC South an… [+6130 chars]
